title: Levi's Men's 550 Relaxed Fit Jeans (Also Available in Big & Tall)
description: LEVI'S 550: These jeans feature a classic, relaxed style with more room for a slightly baggy fit. The 550 also features a tailor-like taper at the leg, complete with zip fly and 5 Pocket Styling.
SIZE & FIT: These 550 jeans sit at the waist with a loose fit through the hip and thigh with a straight but slightly tapered leg opening.
MATERIAL & FABRIC: Levi's 550 jeans are made from a cotton blend.
CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Machine wash cold inside out with like colors, Do not bleach, Tumble dry medium, Hot iron if needed, Dry cleaning possible.
